verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come Holy Spirit, O Lord of all light
Radiance give us from celestial heights
Come thou my Father and give to us poor
Treasures from heaven, Your light that endures.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come Holy Spirit consoler the best
Make your home in us, my souls welcome guest
In toil sweet comfort, my coolness in heat
Solace in darkness, my one only need.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come Holy Spirit, immortal, divine
Fire of love let my heart be refined
Flood with Your love and, do not take away
Grace and your mercy both now and always

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Come Holy Spirit, our strength please renew
And on our dryness pour thy heavenly dew
Melt frozen hearts and wash our guilt away
Guider and teacher, let's not go astray.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Come Holy Spirit seven gifts on us pour
Wisdom and Council and Fear of the Lord
Knowledge and Courage with Reverent praise
Give Understanding and joy all our days.
